properties.areaDesc: Patuxent River to Broomes Island MD
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 16 at 2:44AM EST until January 16 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northwest winds 20 to 25 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt and waves 2 to 4 feet expected. For the Small
Craft Advisory, southwest winds 10 to 15 kt with gusts up to 25
kt expected.

* WHERE...Patuxent River to Broomes Island MD.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 4 PM this afternoon to 6 AM
EST Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 PM EST this
afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM EST FRIDAY
